Description:
Detects execution of the "esxcli" command with the "vsan" flag in order to retrieve information about virtual storage. Seen used by malware such as DarkSide.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Cedric Maurugeon
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ESXi VSAN Information Discovery Via ESXCLI
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%/esxcli' and command like '%vsan%') and (command like '% get%' or command like '% list%'))
